text: kaho, "allaah ka aagyaapaalan karo aur usake rasool ka kaha maano. parantu yadi tum munh modate ho to usapar to bas vahee zimmedaaree hai jisaka bojh usapar daala gaya hai, aur tum usake zimmedaar ho jisaka bojh tumapar daala gaya hai. aur yadi tum aagya ka paalan karoge to maarg pa loge. aur rasool par to bas saaf-saaf (sandesh) pahuncha dene hee kee zimmedaaree hai
